pages.title: ⤝ Nine of Swords ⤝
pages.text: Spirit of Despair and Cruelty$(br)      ♂ Mars in ♊ Gemini

A person seated on their couch in lamentation, the hands cover the face.$(br)  The swords are over them, parallel to each other, blocking the view from a window barely seen.$(br)  They are as one who knows no sorrow which is like unto them, it is a card of utter desolation.$(br)  This powerful and frightening image show us a representation of inner conflict.$(br)  It might make us think of

someone walled in despair and suffering, until they can finally muster the courage to take down the bars of their prison.$(br)  However, the situation may need to be overcome through faith and calculated inaction.$(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Disappointment, failure, despair.$(br)  Enduring a cruel or painful situation.$(br)  Refusing to give in or look away.
$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Imprisonment, doubt, shame.$(br)  Turning away from something.$(br)  Avoiding a painful situation.
